meanings.definition: A portion of something, especially money, that is paid or received at regular intervals.
meanings.sent1: She paid for the car in small installments every month.
meanings.sent2: The loan was divided into several installments to make it easier to manage.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel collected nuts in installments, storing them in different places.
meanings.sent4: Her love for him grew in installments, slowly but steadily.
meanings.sent5: The artist painted the mural in colorful installments, adding a new section each week.

meanings.definition: A series of parts or episodes, typically published or broadcast at regular intervals.
meanings.sent1: The novel was released in installments, keeping readers eagerly waiting for the next part.
meanings.sent2: The documentary series was presented in weekly installments on television.
meanings.sent3: The mystery unfolded in installments, revealing new clues with each episode.
meanings.sent4: Life's journey can be seen as a story told in installments, each chapter bringing new experiences.
meanings.sent5: The podcast releases new installments every Friday, keeping listeners engaged.
